title: Taliyah - Azir's Descendant?
body: I was just playing, and I noticed something about Azir and Taliyah. Their outfits look extremely similar, like the winglike trails from their arms. Azir can control sand, Taliyah can control stone. And then the part that made me more convinced, the next part of the Shurima story that was revamped for her release, is called BLOODLINES. Conspiracy theory? Maybe, but its possible!

replies.body: Taliyah has no royal blood, it is confirmed.
Yup, Taliyah is not related to Azir.

> [{quoted}](name=Jaredan,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=5l0KpJhA,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-05-30T23:25:03.802+0000)
>
> Yup, Taliyah is not related to Azir.

But I must admit, if Taliyah had bloodline with Xerath, it would be really interesting and mind blowing. Someone in another thread said:

_That would be a really cool reveal. Azir's blood manifested in a cold blooded killer who values gold over her friends and Xerath's blood manifested in an extremely good hearted individual who values her family and friends above all else. I think it would be a really cool contrast and I wouldn't mind if this theory turned out to be correct.  -Czeslaw_
